title: Understanding Data Pipelines
text: A data pipeline involves the process of moving data from one system to another. It often includes data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL).

title: Role of a Data Engineer
text: A Data Engineer is responsible for designing, building, and maintaining data pipelines. They ensure that data flows smoothly from source to destination.

title: Distinguishing Roles
text: While Data Scientists and Data Analysts focus on analyzing data, a Data Engineer focuses on the infrastructure that supports data analysis.

title: Identifying the Role
text: The role that primarily deals with creating and maintaining data pipelines is the Data Engineer.
